definition: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.chinese: 他們在得克薩斯州定居下來了。

sentences.english: The five people sickened in California and three in Texas have all recovered.
sentences.chinese: 患病的5人在加利福尼亞州和得克薩斯州三都收回。

sentences.english: So who is willing to make the move to Dallas, Texas USA?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，誰願意來美國得克薩斯州達拉斯市？

sentences.english: With young Walter, the family moved from the Midwest to Texas.
sentences.chinese: 隨着年輕的瓦爾特，全家搬到從中西部到得克薩斯州。

sentences.english: Part of the Amistad Reservoir on the Rio Grande in Texas.
sentences.chinese: 部分特德水庫里奧格蘭德在得克薩斯州。

sentences.english: Coreopsis wildflowers bloom on the Texas coastal prairie.
sentences.chinese: 在得克薩斯州的沿岸草原，野波斯菊迎風開放。

sentences.english: In the front is Harlon Block, a Marine from Yorktown, Texas.
sentences.chinese: 在前面是哈隆塊，從約克鎮，得克薩斯州海岸。

sentences.english: Two high school students in Texas were told by their principal they could not wear rosaries .
sentences.chinese: 兩名高中生在得克薩斯州告訴其主，他們不能穿珠。

sentences.english: But northern states opposed statehood for Texas.
sentences.chinese: 但北部各州反對爲得克薩斯州建州。

sentences.english: The cowboy of myth and reality had his beginnings in Texas.
sentences.chinese: 牛仔的神話特點和真實性在得克薩斯州有其起源。

sentences.english: SXSW is a private company based in Austin, Texas.
sentences.chinese: SXSW是一傢俬人公司，位於得克薩斯州奧斯丁市。

sentences.english: I am eleven years old and I live in Cypress , Texas.
sentences.chinese: 我十一歲，我住在傑生得克薩斯州塞浦樂思。

pinyin: Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 zhou1
